title: Will my TalkBand B2 count my steps when I wear the Bluetooth headset on my ear or put my hands in my pockets?
answer:
The TalkBand B2 features an advanced 6-axis motion sensor that can still count your steps when you wear the Bluetooth headset. To avoid dropping and damaging the Bluetooth headset, install the Bluetooth headset back to the strap and wear the TalkBand B2 on your wrist when you are exercising.

If you put your hand in your pocket, the TalkBand B2 may fail to count your steps accurately because the TalkBand B2 flips irregularly in this scenario.
